headers.subject: Re: Slow deletes
headers.comments: In-reply-to Edmund Dengler <edmundd@eSentire.com> message dated "Mon, 12 Aug 2002 23:04:09 -0400"

quote.quotepara: Anyway to conveniently dump the triggers (3 are constraint check, my own personal one is suppose to be on inserts only)?

body.para: The RI on-delete trigger must be the issue then. Lack of indexes, or linking to a foreign key of a different column type are the trouble causes I've seen there ...
